content.rendered:
Directed by Agnidev Chatterjee

Written by Saurabh M. Pandey

Star Aakash Dabhade (Chotte). Govardhan Asrani (Marriage agent). Manoj Balaji (Taxi Driver). Pooja Chopra (Avantika). Mahesh Chandra Deva (Young villager (as Mahesh Deva)). Sumit Gulati (PP). Manoj Joshi (Babloo’s Uncle). Sharman Joshi (Babloo). Raju Kher (Swati’s Father).Pulkit Kumar . Livert (Police Inspector). Prakriti Nautiyal (Bride). Leena Prabhu (Babloo’s Mother). Tejashree Pradhan (Swati). Prakriti (Bride). Charu Rohtagi (Swati’s Mother). Rajesh Sharma (Babloo’s Father). Dhruv Thukral (Self – Rohan (Avantika Friend) (credit only)). Punit Vashisht (Munna). Kammie Waghela (Swati’s Manager). Sweety Walia (Babloo’s Aunt)

Language Hindi

Producers Ajay Rajwani. Arif Shaikh. Arif Shaikh. Parag Vijra

Production Altair Media. Rafat Films
